title: Poster, "What Saves a Building?", 1976
medium:
offset lithograph
Support: olive green paper
inscribed: Imprinted in black ink across top: What Saves a Building?; at UL: Preservation/Bulletin/Number One/June 1976/; at URC: Published by/The Graduate School of/ Architecture and Planning/Columbia University; lengthy text throughtout poster pertaining to: Money; Research;Public Awareness; Law; at LR:Design:Arnold Saks Associates/ 1976 by the Trustees of Columbia University/ in the City of New York. On verso: letter from: James Stewart Polshek/Dean/Graduate School of/ Architecture and Planning/ Columbia University...; To:"Dear Neighbor..."; address information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "What Saves a Building?", 1976. offset lithograph
Support: olive green paper. 1991-69-125.
